mapper.sql: id, job_name as jobName, retry_count as retryCount, time_expression as timeExpression, submit_ip as submitIp, execute_url as executeUrl, execute_date as executeDate, is_valid as isValid, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate,
mapper.update: UPDATE job_info SET job_name = #{jobName}, retry_count as retryCount, time_expression as timeExpression, submit_ip as submitIp, execute_url as executeUrl, execute_date as executeDate, is_valid as isValid WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT execute_date FROM job_info WHERE execute_date>#{startDate} AND is_valid=1 ORDER BY execute_date LIMIT 1
